CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(bpats__ATS_Role_Type__c) ,'User' ), bpats__User__r.FirstName & " " & bpats__User__r.LastName , IF(ISPICKVAL(bpats__ATS_Role_Type__c , 'Branch'), bpats__ATS_Branch_Receiving_Credit__c , IF(ISPICKVAL(bpats__ATS_Role_Type__c ,'House' ), 'House', null)))
CustomField.label: Credit Recipient
